name: CRITERIA_REVIEW_GEN_TRACK
description: This table contains information for reviews created with the Generated Drafts for Utilization Review feature in the Manual Review activity.

columns.name: CRITERIA_REVIEW_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the criteria review record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: GEN_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the user started this generation.

columns.name: GEN_RESP_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the draft or error was returned to the user for this generated draft.

columns.name: GEN_DECISN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time a user accepts or discards the generated review draft.

columns.name: GEN_DECISN_C_NAME
columns.description: The decision category ID for the generated review draft.

columns.name: GEN_STYLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The style category ID for the generated review draft.

columns.name: LOOKBACK_START_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time of the start of the lookback time period for this generated draft.

columns.name: LOOKBACK_END_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time of the end of the lookback time period for this generated draft.

columns.name: GEN_FEEDBACK_C_NAME
columns.description: The feedback category ID for the generated review draft.

columns.name: GEN_ERR_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether an error occured during the review draft generation. 'Y' indicates that an error was logged. 'N' or NULL indicates that no error was logged.

columns.name: GEN_PROMPT_VERS
columns.description: The version of the prompt used to generate the draft.
